Uses of Package
elki.utilities.scaling

  • Packages that use elki.utilities.scaling 
    Package Description
    elki.application.greedyensemble
    Greedy ensembles for outlier detection.
    elki.evaluation.outlier
    Evaluate an outlier score using a misclassification based cost model.
    elki.evaluation.similaritymatrix
    Render a distance matrix to visualize a clustering-distance-combination.
    elki.outlier.meta
    Meta outlier detection algorithms: external scores, score rescaling.
    elki.utilities.scaling
    Scaling functions: linear, logarithmic, gamma, clipping, ...
    elki.utilities.scaling.outlier
    Scaling of outlier scores, that require a statistical analysis of the occurring values.
    elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot.outlier
    Visualizers for outlier scores based on 2D projections.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.application.greedyensemble 
    Class Description
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.evaluation.outlier 
    Class Description
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.evaluation.similaritymatrix 
    Class Description
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.outlier.meta 
    Class Description
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.utilities.scaling 
    Class Description
    ClipScaling
    Scale implementing a simple clipping.
    GammaScaling
    Non-linear scaling function using a Gamma curve.
    LinearScaling
    Simple linear scaling function.
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
    StaticScalingFunction
    Interface for Scaling functions that do NOT depend on analyzing the data set.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.utilities.scaling.outlier 
    Class Description
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
  • Classes in elki.utilities.scaling used by elki.visualization.visualizers.scatterplot.outlier 
    Class Description
    ScalingFunction
    Interface for scaling functions used, e.g., by outlier evaluation such as Histograms and visualization.
